entity.name: freeOrder
entity.query: SELECT fo.id,fo.status_id,fo.scope_id,fo.category_id,fo.supplier_or_manufacturer,fo.payment_option_id, fo.taken_activity_name_id,fo.taken_company_id,fo.taken_activity_id,fo.child_free_orders,fo.parent_id, fo.total_brut,fo.total_net,fo.total_volume,fo.total_count,fo.total_price, fo.net_me_id,fo.brut_me_id,fo.volume_me_id,fo.count_me_id,fo.unit_id, c.id AS company_id,c.status AS company_status,c.is_cash_payments AS is_cash_payments,c.is_cashless_payments_vat_included AS is_cashless_payments_vat_included, c.is_cashless_payments_without_vat AS is_cashless_payments_without_vat,c.is_cashless_payments_on_card AS is_cashless_payments_on_card FROM free_orders fo LEFT JOIN companies c ON c.id = fo.company_id WHERE fo.proposal_free_order_id IS NULL AND fo.parent_id IS NULL AND c.status = 1
